title: IDesignTable.EnableCellDropdownLists
description: Gets or sets whether to enable cell drop-down lists in the design table.
returns: True to enable cell drop-down lists in the design table, false to disable them
remarks:
You must call:
IDesignTable::EditFeature
before setting this property.
IDesignTable::UpdateFeature
after setting this property.

Disable Cell Drop-down Lists in Design Table (VB.NET)
